name: Fruit Squash
description:
Introducing... FRUIT SQUASH! Here is my take on the classic 'block-buster' style game. I chose to theme my game on fruit cubes (like those really satisfying images of perfectly cut cubes of fruit) and wanted it to have a fun, fruity, beachy feel which hopefully comes through with the colours chosen and the sprites I designed. I set the game on an empty, calm sandy beach as it reminded me of having fruit on summer vacation and the ball is a volleyball - which seemed to make sense to me

Play through all 25 levels to discover new features gain the highest score possible!

Play either in the browser or download the game to play on you PC.
